input_text:
Job Title: Chief Executive Officer

Location: Georgia, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Strategy/Planning

Description:
Title: CEOLocation: GeorgiaIndustry: Environmental Services (Private Equity)
The ideal candidate is a visionary leader with 25+ years of experience in the Environmental Engineering and Environmental Services industry, a Professional Engineer (PE) or Professional Geologist (PG) license, P&L, and budgeting experience. The ideal candidate will possess a deep understanding of the environmental services industry, a proven track record of success, and a strong commitment to environmental stewardship and sustainability.
Compensation:Highly competitive salary + STI + LTIFull Benefits; Medical, Dental, Vision, Life, 401KOutstanding company culture
Position OverviewThe CEO will oversee all of the company’s functions, finance, operations, marketing, sales, engineering, and environmental consulting. They will also be responsible for providing strategic direction and spearheading growth initiatives for the company.
Essential Functions: Develop and execute a strategic plan for the company to promote growth and expansionOversee all aspects of the company's operations, ensuring efficient and effective delivery of servicesProvide leadership and direction to all departments, ensuring operational excellence and efficiencyFoster a culture of innovation and continuous improvementDrive business growth and market expansion through innovative services, strategic partnerships, and client acquisitionOversee financial performance, including budgeting, forecasting, P&L management, and financial reportingEnsure compliance with company, government, OSHA, and other job-specific regulationsCultivate and maintain relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, regulatory agencies, and industry associationsStay abreast of industry trends, regulations, and emerging technologiesRepresent the company at industry events and conferences
Knowledge, Skill, and Experience: Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering, (PE preferred)Must have 25+ years of experience in environmental engineering and environmental services industry, with a proven track record of leadership and achievementMust have a Professional Engineer (PE) and/or a Professional Geologist (PG) licenseDemonstrated experience in P&L management, budgeting, and financial oversightExcellent business acumen with the ability to develop and execute strategic plans that drive growth and profitability.Excellent analytical, negotiation, problem-solving, organizational, oral, and written communication skillsProven success as a leader in motivating and inspiring teamsDeep understanding of the environmental services industry, environmental regulations, compliance requirements, and industry best practicesProven ability to navigate complex business environments and foster relationships with diverse stakeholdersA passion for environmental sustainability

Experience Level (if available): Executive

output_json.title: Chief Executive Officer
output_json.summary: Visionary leader with 25+ years of experience in Environmental Engineering and Services industry, PE or PG license, P&L, budgeting experience.
job_responsibilities: Develop and execute strategic plan for company growth and expansion
Oversee all aspects of company operations
Provide leadership and direction to all departments
Foster a culture of innovation and continuous improvement
Drive business growth through innovative services, strategic partnerships, and client acquisition
Oversee financial performance including budgeting, forecasting, P&L management, and financial reporting
Ensure compliance with company, government, OSHA, and other regulations
Cultivate and maintain relationships with key stakeholders
Stay abreast of industry trends, regulations, and emerging technologies
Represent the company at industry events and conferences
benefits: Full benefits package including medical, dental, vision, life insurance, and 401K
